demo.name: brd2601b.demo.btmesh_ncp_empty
demo.label: Bluetooth Mesh - NCP Empty
demo.model:description: An NCP Target C application that makes it possible for the NCP Host Controller to access the Bluetooth Mesh stack via UART. It provides access to the host layer via BGAPI and not to the link layer via HCI.

property.value: Bluetooth Mesh - NCP Empty
Device\ Type|NCP Project\ Difficulty|Beginner Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.btmesh_soc_hsl
demo.label: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC HSL Light
demo.model:description: An out-of-the-box software demo where the LEDs of the mainboard can be switched on and off, and their lighting intensity, hue, and saturation can be set. The example also tries to establish friendship as a Friend node.

property.value: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC HSL Light
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh

demo.model:description: This example demonstrates the Bluetooth Mesh Sensor Client Model. It collects and displays sensor measurement data from remote device(s) (e.g., btmesh_soc_sensor_server).

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.btmesh_soc_sensor_server
demo.label: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC Sensor Server
demo.model:description: This example demonstrates the Bluetooth Mesh Sensor Server Model and Sensor Setup Server Model. It measures temperature, people count, and illuminance, and sends the measurement data to a remote device (e.g., btmesh_soc_sensor_client).

property.value: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC Sensor Server
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.btmesh_soc_switch_low_power
demo.label: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC Switch Low Power
demo.model:description: An out-of-the-box Software Demo where the device acts as a switch. It is optimized for low current consumption with disabled CLI, logging, and LCD.Push Button presses can control the state, lightness, and color temperature of the LEDs and scenes on a remote device.

property.value: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC Switch Low Power
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh

demo.name: brd4104a.demo.btmesh_soc_switch_low_power
demo.label: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC Switch Low Power
demo.model:description: An out-of-the-box Software Demo where the device acts as a switch. It is optimized for low current consumption with disabled CLI, logging, and LCD.Push Button presses can control the state, lightness, and color temperature of the LEDs and scenes on a remote device.

property.value: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC Switch Low Power
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh

demo.name: brd4108a.demo.btmesh_soc_switch_low_power
demo.label: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC Switch Low Power
demo.model:description: A Software Demo where the device acts as a switch. It is optimized for low current consumption with disabled CLI, logging, and LCD. Button presses (only PB0 is functional) can control the state, lightness, and color temperature of the LEDs and scenes on a remote device.

property.value: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC Switch Low Power
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh

demo.model:description: A Software Demo where the device acts as a switch. It is optimized for low current consumption with disabled CLI, logging, and LCD. Button presses (only PB0 is functional) can control the state, lightness, and color temperature of the LEDs and scenes on a remote device.

property.value: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC Switch Low Power
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.btmesh_soc_switch
demo.label: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC Switch
demo.model:description: An out-of-the-box Software Demo where the device acts as a switch. Push Button presses or CLI commands can control the state, lightness, and color temperature of the LEDs and scenes on a remote device.

property.value: Bluetooth Mesh - SoC Switch
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth\ Mesh
